<a id="ScriptCreateDialog"></a>

# ScriptCreateDialog

**Inherits:** [ConfirmationDialog](ConfirmationDialog.md) **\<** [AcceptDialog](AcceptDialog.md) **\<** [Window](Window.md) **\<** [Viewport](Viewport.md) **\<** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Redot editor's popup dialog for creating new [Script](Script.md) files.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

The **ScriptCreateDialog** creates script files according to a given template for a given scripting language. The standard use is to configure its fields prior to calling one of the [Window.popup()](Window.md#Window_method_popup) methods.




```gdscript
    func _ready():
        var dialog = ScriptCreateDialog.new();
        dialog.config("Node", "res://new_node.gd") # For in-engine types.
        dialog.config("\"res://base_node.gd\"", "res://derived_node.gd") # For script types.
        dialog.popup_centered()
```


```csharp
    public override void _Ready()
    {
        var dialog = new ScriptCreateDialog();
        dialog.Config("Node", "res://NewNode.cs"); // For in-engine types.
        dialog.Config("\"res://BaseNode.cs\"", "res://DerivedNode.cs"); // For script types.
        dialog.PopupCentered();
    }
```
